title: Abstract Oil Study No. 7
description: An original oil painting from our curated art collection. Bold gestural strokes in warm ochre, cream, and charcoal — a statement piece that works equally well in modern and transitional interiors.
descriptionCn: 来自我们精选艺术系列的原创油画。以温暖赭石、乳白和炭灰的大胆笔触——一件在现代和过渡风格室内同样出色的声明作品。

seo.title: Abstract Oil Study No. 7 — Julia Studio Shop
seo.description: Original oil painting in warm ochre, cream, and charcoal. Statement piece for modern and transitional interiors.
